rules_text: Choose a card name. Until your next turn, your opponents can't cast spells with the chosen name or attack with creatures with the chosen name.
flavor_text: [i]“Hear the words of God as spoken by the high and holy. Hear them, and become them. Do not stray from their path.”[/i]
notes: fluffy: name a card—>choose a card name, moved next turn to beginning (Failure/Comply)
